review.title: “The best place to work in a crazy no personal life job”
review.pros: Pros – For a tow opperator having a 12 hour shift on and 12 hours off is a great benifit! The towing equipment is all very well maintained and new and thus makes for a much easier to complete jobs and impress customers. All workers there are competent and friendly and make each day of work in a high stress job a little more fun.
review.cons: Cons – Once you start as a driver you can pretty much count on the fact that you will always be just a driver.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – To give the good news about the job being done aswell as the bad.
